summaries:
The document is a Form 10-K annual report for Oracle Corporation, incorporated in Delaware, filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) for the fiscal year ended May 31, 2025. The company's principal executive offices are located in Austin, Texas.

Oracle Corporation has one class of common stock, par value $0.01 per share, traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol ORCL. They also have 3.125% senior notes due July 2025. No securities are registered pursuant to Section 12(g) of the Act.

The company is a large accelerated filer, and they have filed all required reports for the past 90 days and submitted every Interactive Data File required by Rule 405 of Regulation S-T during the preceding 12 months. The registrant has filed a report on and attestation to its management’s assessment of the effectiveness of its internal control over financial reporting under Section 404(b) of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act.

As of May 31, 2025, the aggregate market value of voting stock held by non-affiliates was $305,793,119,000. The number of shares of common stock outstanding as of June 13, 2025, is 2,808,833,000.

Portions of the registrant's definitive proxy statement relating to its 2025 annual meeting of stockholders are incorporated by reference into Part III of this Annual Report on Form 10-K and will be filed with the SEC within 120 days of the end of Oracle Corporation's fiscal year. No specific product information, discoveries, IP, or operational processes were mentioned in this document.
